name: Zen & Sword Art
description:
This demo is a simple but deep two-player fighting game

Experience sword art and zen in combat!

The game is currently an early demo version, 

offering only two-player battles and a default of two characters

Control：

- P1: W, A, S, D

- P2: UpArrow, LeftArrow, DownArrow, RightArrow

Future development plans May include:

- Provide single player mode

- Adding more distinctive characters

- More scenario and performance optimization
